title: [QUESTION] Is there a VS visualizer for SkiaSharp?
body: Is there a visualizer for Visual Studio that allows to inspect images during debug (like the one available from OpenCv)?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
This is a very good question. No, for now. But definitely something that will be very helpful.

Are you talking about this one: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=VisualCPPTeam.ImageWatch

comments.author: mlptownsend
comments.body:
If anyone is out there looking for something like this, I created a debugger visualizer for SKBitmap, SKImage, and SKSurface.
https://github.com/MapLarge/SkiaSharpVisualizer
